summary: This document is an email chain from December 2016 between Steve Smith, a sales representative for SigNet Technologies, and an unidentified recipient regarding a quote for a DVR system upgrade. The emails discuss technical proposals and include standard corporate confidentiality notices.

persons.name: Steve Smith
persons.context: Steve Smith is the sender of the email chain, providing quotes and proposals for a DVR upgrade to an unidentified recipient on behalf of SigNet Technologies.

events.title: Initial DVR Upgrade Inquiry
events.description: Steve Smith emails an unidentified recipient to discuss providing a quote for a DVR upgrade.

events.title: First Proposal Submission
events.description: Steve Smith sends the first of two proposals for the DVR upgrade, mentioning it uses existing equipment.

events.title: Turnkey Proposal Submission
events.description: Steve Smith sends the turnkey version of the DVR upgrade proposal to the recipient.

locations.address: 12300 Kiln Ct Suite E, Beltsville, MD 20705
locations.context: Business address for SigNet Technologies as listed in the email signature.

keyFacts: The document is a business email chain about a DVR system upgrade quote from SigNet Technologies.
The primary correspondent is Steve Smith, a Federal Sales Representative for SigNet Technologies.
The recipient's identity is redacted or omitted, referred to only as 'Mr.' in the text.
The emails contain standard corporate confidentiality and proprietary information notices.
The correspondence dates from late November to early December 2016.
